example.text: Time and time again, POTUS has failed to counter, curb, and compete with China - we cannot continue this show of weakness when it comes to protecting our country. We need answers on the Biden Administration's lack of urgency to address this brazen act by the CCP.

I also had the opportunity to visit Conroe City Hall, a Lake Conroe Area Republican Women's meeting, the Walker County Storm Shelter, and Polk County VFW in Livingston. Have a great week, Rep. Morgan Luttrell Member of Congress Sign up for my newsletter to get updates on this issue and others!

This week, I signed onto a letter to Secretary Mayorkas concerning the Department of Homeland Security's role in the lack of response to the Chinese spy balloon and House Republicans passed a resolution to condemn the Chinese Communist Party's use of a spy balloon over our country. Whiteboard Wednesday: Repealing Mandates & Getting Federal Employees Back to Work Passport PSA The State Department is encouraging passport applications and renewals during the off-peak travel season in fall or winter because demand is lower and processing is faster.

For regular updates on how I am serving the people of Texas, follow me on Facebook , Twitter , and Instagram.
